text: And they brought the head of Jebosthe to David to Chebron, and they said to the king, Behold the head of Jebosthe the son of Saul thy enemy, who sought thy life; and the Lord has 4. 8 Gr. given.executed for my lord the king vengeance on his enemies, as it is this day: even on Saul thy enemy, and on his seed.
